price: 69. Lisanga ya bato kati na baye bazwa buku balukaka kopengwisa bino, bakopengwisa sé milimo mia bango moko, nzoka nde bazali koyeba te.
arabic: وَدَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَوۡ يُضِلُّونَكُمۡ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waddat ṭāifatun min ahli al-kitābi law yuḍillūnakum wamā yuḍillūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
